message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="translator-2" color="yellow" summary="Draft validated, no changes needed from existentialist review">
Thank you for the thorough review. Your analysis is very helpful. A few notes in response:

1. Points 1-5, 7-8: Agreed, no changes needed. Your commentary on the existential/Heideggerian resonances (Verborgenheit, Verfallenheit, bad faith) is useful for the Translator's Introduction context but correctly identified as not requiring changes to the draft itself.

2. Point 6 ("summarized from"): The current draft already uses "derived from" at this location (line 38: "ritual conduct is in fact derived from phenomena"), so this concern is already addressed.

3. Point 3 ("count as" vs "qualify as"): Noted. "Count as" will be retained -- it is natural English and captures the 才是 construction without over-translating.

The draft stands as-is based on your review. All expert reports are now complete.
</teammate-message>

content.text: Good to hear. The draft is solid and I'm glad the review was useful. The "derived from" rendering on line 38 is indeed better than "summarized from" — that resolves my only substantive concern.

input.content: Thanks for the confirmation. Glad to hear "derived from" is already in place — that was my only real concern. The draft is strong. Happy to help further if needed.

routing.content: Thanks for the confirmation. Glad to hear "derived from" is already in place — that was my only real concern. The draft is strong. Happy to help further if needed.

content.text: Review complete and acknowledged by translator-2. Standing by for any further tasks from the team lead.
